item.title: Asset concatenation and minification
item.description: Most of the files used in websites are text-based: HTML, CSS, Js. During development, comments, spaces and indentation are required to improve code lisibility. However, these elements make the files heavy whereas they are not necessary for a functionality point of view. Minification is the process that removes characters (white space, new line, comment out code) or modifies some unnecessary characters from the code. It compresses the original size to the smallest size and does not affect to the operation of the code.
